content: a bookmark for dobby all house-elves love to read - right i imagine the lonely single sock he was given to secure his they have an elf library and love nothing more freedom so i designed one than coming home every week with a pile of lovely books so it makes sense to me that they these tiny socks are super fun to knit and make will need some bookmarks a perfect gift for yourself or a special elf friend when i think of what a bookmark for a house-elf let s knit tiny socks and free those house-elves would look like i can only think of dobby and a bookmark for dobby this pattern is for personal use only - knit washed and blocked measurement in stocking p - purl stitch gauge is not essential for this project s - slip purl-wise yo- yarn over finished dimensions psso - pass the slipped stitch over ssk - slip a stitch knit-wise slip a second stitch knit-wise the finished sock is approximately 5 inches or and then knit these 2 stitches together through the front 13cm from cuff to toe loop p2tog - purl 2 stitches together k2tog - knit 2 stitches together pm - place marker a bookmark for dobby this pattern is for personal use only - © 2018 kay jones do not reproduce mrsbakerybear@gmail com cuff cast on 32 stitches and join for knitting in the round i cast on using the long tail method the front needle as you look at your work will be needle 1 and the back needle will be needle 2 you can choose to knit any of the following rib patterns option 1 - k2 p2 to end of round option 2 - k1 p1 to end of round option 3 - k1tbl p1 to end of round knit your chosen rib for a total of 10 rounds leg heel flap knit 20 rounds the heel flap is worked back and forth over half of your total stitches and is knit on needle 2 this is the back of your if you prefer a patterned sock then you can substitute the work as you look at it 20 rounds of stocking stitch for 20 rounds of either of the following - row 1 - s1 purl to the end of the row turn your work lace option row 2 - s1 k1 repeat to the end of the row turn your round 1 - k2 yo s1knit-wise k1
